GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by article ID including comment_count

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a given article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to a given article ID

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates a comment by changing votes

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user by given username
